mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(id, pwd, name, email, phone, address, reg_date) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users WHERE id = #{id} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET pwd = #{pwd}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT id, pwd, name, email, phone, address,reg_date from users
